title: Who’s The Kindest Champion In The Game?
body:
Which champion do you think is the kindest in the game?  Who would bear comfort a sad person, help someone in need, or be the friendliest to their peers?  Justify your opinion with lore or gameplay.

Here’s my choice.

Soraka.  She surrendered immortality because she couldn’t bear the pain of watching helpless people suffer.  She lives to help people in need and spends games running around, dishing out big heals and calling on the stars themselves to save teammates.  She even tried to see the goodness and humanity left in Warwick, in one telling of her story.
